title.rendered: Ride 360 Is Updating to My Ride K-12 App

content.rendered:
We have been alerted that the Ride 360 app used by the Transportation Department to provide families with bus route information will be changing to the My Ride K-12 app on May 1, 2024. My Ride K-12 provides the same features as the Ride 360 app and more.

To access bus route information, parents and guardians may download the updated My Ride K-12 app from the Apple or Android app stores. Usernames and passwords from Ride 360 will transfer over to My Ride K-12.

My Ride K-12 – Apple App Store (iOS) 

My Ride K-12 – Google Play Store (Android) 

For more information, visit the transportation department section of the website.
